scenario.name: uas_update

recv.action:
<ereg regexp="<sip:([^;@]+)" search_in="hdr" header="From:" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,remote_number"/> <ereg regexp="<sip:([^;@]+)" search_in="hdr" header="To:" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,local_number"/>
<ereg regexp="]+)" search_in="hdr" header="To:" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,local_domain" /> <ereg regexp="]+)" search_in="hdr" header="From:" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,remote_domain" />

scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 180 Ringing [last_Via:] Record-Route: <sip:test1.domain.ru> Record-Route: <sip:test2.domain.com> Record-Route: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[$local_tag] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Require: 100rel Rseq: [cseq] Contact: <sip:test.record@test.record.route.com:[local_port]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=update_test 10000 10000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=update_test c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] Record-Route: <sip:test1.domain.ru> Record-Route: <sip:test2.domain.com> Record-Route: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK Record-Route: <sip:test1.domain.ru> Record-Route: <sip:test2.domain.com> Record-Route: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Via:[$inv_via] From:[$inv_from] To:[$inv_to];tag=[$local_tag] [last_call-id] CSeq: [$inv_cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:test.record@test.record.route.com:[local_port]> Content-Length: 0

UPDATE sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_ip]:[$remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test1.domain.ru:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-19 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test2.domain.com:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-20 Record-Route: <sip:test1.domain.ru> Record-Route: <sip:test2.domain.com> Record-Route: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> From: <sip:[$local_number]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_domain]>;tag=[$remote_tag] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] UPDATE Contact: <sip:test.record@test.record.route.com:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=update_test 10000 10001 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=update_test t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio 8192 RTP/AVP 18 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000

SIP/2.0 200 OK Record-Route: <sip:test1.domain.ru> Record-Route: <sip:test2.domain.com> Record-Route: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Content-Length: 0
